name: Moon through the Sun
description:
"The princess of the other kingdom got imprisoned in their old dungeon! Go through the old forest to reach the shore where we put a boat for you. Get the princess out of her imprisonment and bring her back.

                      

Controls Keyboard

Move: A/D

Look up & down: W/S

Jump: Spacebar

Ability: F

Pause: Esc

Gamepad

Make sure your controller is on before you turn the game on! 

Move: Left stick 

Look up & down: gamepad north & south 

Jump: A-Button/ Cross - Button 

Ability: X-Button/ Square - Button 

Pause: Start-Button

                      

Game by Curly Wynvan Music and Sounds used from Epidemic Sounds Special Thanks to  Ghotti for helping the Background Image TheGreatKida Nayu
